article: Korean culture is really popular right now. The Korean Wave is sweeping Asian countries including  _  . Young people are  _  The Korean Wave started  a few  years ago with the TV series Winter . This love story is still popular now. People, especially girls, like the beautiful stories and handsome actors  such as  Pei Yongjun. In the music world, Korean stars are making  _  heard in China. You can often find big Korean names such as Baby Vox, SES and Finkle at the top of the Chinese  _  charts . The Korean Wave  also  makes young people try the clothes and hairstyles of the Korean pop stars. Besides those, now some girls in China are having plastic surgery  to change  their looks. It is said that many Korean stars look beautiful  because of  plastic surgery. As you see, Korean culture has changed us a lot. Is it  _  for us to follow in every way? We each should think about it.
